projects.name: Make My PC
projects.description: This is my PF on henry, made alongside my dev partners PCcorp, this is an Ecommerce proyect deployed on Vercel and Render that holds a bulk of features like filtering, pagination, search, login, register, payments and more!. this proyects is made with TypeScript, GraphQL, JavaScript and React

projects.name: PokeAapp
projects.description: This is my solo Proyect form henry, it holds features like pagination, filters, search, api calls and MVC, it is made with the stack of Express, Sequelize, React-Redux and JavaScript

projects.name: SportGo
projects.description: This is a Grup proyect form Digital House, is made with a stack of Express, EJS and JavaScript
